multishop.desc: This is a multi-client e-commerce web app donde where sellers can publish and sell their products as also clients can find products of all kind.

expense_tracker.desc: An SAP designed for making tracks of different types of transactions: incomes and expenses. The project is built with React.js and using the Context API.

digcoin_news.desc: A web app where you can find thorough information about the crypto currencies, its price in the market and also be able to see more details about each crypto currency. And last but not least, you can see the latest news about the crypto world.
